channel.title: Plastic Cable Gland on Herfom
channel.description: Recent content in Plastic Cable Gland on Herfom

item.title: Nylon Bend Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, NPT Material: Nylon, Seal Material: Nitrile Rubber (NBR) Color: Gray / Black Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, short time to 120℃ Dynamic -20℃ to 80℃, short time to 100℃ Features: Long life, Small shrinkage, Good toughness, Oxidation resistance, Wear resistance Structure A: Tight head B: Clamping claw C: Body D: Nut Specification 1.

item.title: Nylon / PP Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, NPT, G, MG Material: Nylon(PA) / PP, Seal Material: Nitrile Rubber (NBR) Color: Gray / Black Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, short time to 120℃ Dynamic -20℃ to 80℃, short time to 100℃ Features: Long life, Small shrinkage, Good toughness, Oxidation resistance, Wear resistance Structure A: Tight head B: Clamping claw & body C: Nut Specification 1.

item.title: Nylon Spiral Cable Gland
item.description: Introduction Thread Specifications: M (Metric), PG, NPT, G Material: Nylon(PA), Seal Material: Nitrile Rubber (NBR) Color: Gray / Black Protection Level: IP68 Working Temperature: Static -40℃ to 100℃, short time to 120℃ Dynamic -20℃ to 80℃, short time to 100℃ Features: Long life, Small shrinkage, Good toughness, Oxidation resistance, Wear resistance Structure A: Nut
